content:
1. "Unleash the modern man within"
2. "Elevate your grooming game"
3. "For the man who demands more"
4. "Where rugged meets refined"
5. "Unleash your true potential"
6. "Elevate your everyday"
7. "For the man who wants it all"
8. "Unleash your inner gentleman"
9. "A cut above the rest"
10. "Elevate your grooming routine"

Please keep in mind that the tagline should be memorable, easy to understand and consistent with the brand's message. It should also be tested with a focus group to see how it resonates with the target audience.
